languages.text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal <u>number of adjacent creatures</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} rank</u> warp damage to enemies.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal <u>number of adjacent creatures</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} rank</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

languages.text:
当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，会对周围所有生物与自身造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}。
此外，装备者还会对周围敌人造成额外的亚空间{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于装备者的{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，会对周围所有生物与自身造成1点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。
此外，装备者还会对周围敌人造成额外的亚空间伤害，等同于<u>装备者的“异端主义”信念等级</u>。

当装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，会对周围所有生物与自身造成{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，等同于{uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}。
此外，装备者还会对周围敌人造成额外的亚空间伤害，等同于装备者的{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}。

languages.text:
Завершая свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж наносит {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} всем существам на соседних клетках, а также себе.
Также персонаж наносит противникам +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} варп-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Завершая свой ход, персонаж наносит 1 варп-урон всем существам на соседних клетках, а также себе.
Также персонаж наносит противникам +<u>уровень Скверны</u> варп-урона дополнительно.

Завершая свой ход, персонаж наносит 1 варп-урон всем существам на соседних клетках, а также себе.
Также персонаж наносит противникам +<u>уровень Скверны</u> варп-урона дополнительно.

Завершая свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g}, равный {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}, всем существам на соседних клетках, а также себе.
Также персонаж наносит противникам +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} варп-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたび、隣接するすべての生物と使用者自身に{uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}を与える。
使用者はさらに、敵に{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}の歪み{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を追加で付与する。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたび、隣接する各生物と使用者自身に{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を1付与する。
使用者はさらに、敵に<u>信念 — 異端者ランク</u>のワープダメージを追加で付与する。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたび、隣接する生物それぞれと使用者自身に{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を1付与する。
使用者はさらに、敵に{uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}のワープ{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を追加で付与する。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたび、隣接する生物それぞれと使用者自身に{uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を1付与する。
使用者はさらに、敵に{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4}のワープ{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を追加で付与する。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador finaliza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, causa {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} igual a {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} a cada criatura adyacente y a sí mismo.
El portador también inflige +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de disformidad a los enemigos.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador finaliza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, causa 1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} a cada criatura adyacente y a sí mismo.
El portador también causa +<u>rango de Convicción: Hereticus</u> de daño de disformidad a los enemigos.

Cada vez que el portador finaliza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, causa {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} igual al {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} a cada criatura adyacente y a sí mismo.
El portador también inflige +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} de daño de disformidad a los enemigos.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, fügt er jeder angrenzenden Kreatur und sich selbst {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zu.
Der Träger fügt Feinden außerdem zusätzlich +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} Warp-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, verursacht er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g} bei jeder angrenzenden Kreatur sowie bei sich selbst.
Der Träger verursacht außerdem zusätzlich +<u>Überzeugung — Haereticus-Rang</u> Warpschaden bei Feinden.

Immer wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, fügt er jeder angrenzenden Kreatur sowie sich selbst {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zu.
Der Träger fügt Feinden außerdem zusätzlich +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} Warp-Schaden zu.

languages.text:
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} point de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes ainsi qu'à lui-même.
L'utilisateur inflige également +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} du Warp aux ennemis.

Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Au terme de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige 1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes ainsi qu'à lui-même.
L'utilisateur inflige également +<u>rang Conviction — Hereticus</u> points de dégâts warp aux ennemis.

Au terme de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige 1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes ainsi qu'à lui-même.
L'utilisateur inflige également +<u>rang Conviction — Hereticus</u> points de dégâts warp aux ennemis.

Au terme de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur inflige {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} point de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes ainsi qu'à lui-même.
L'utilisateur inflige également +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} points de dégâts Warp aux ennemis.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} sonlandırdığında hem bitişiğindeki yaratıkların her birine hem de kendisine {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} verir.
Giyen kişi, ayrıca düşmanlara +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} ilave öteboyut {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} verir.

The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.
